execution_quality: Agent took a methodical approach with diagnostics and iterative fixes, but the follow-up socket timeout error suggests the core XOAUTH2 issue may not have been resolved before new network problems emerged.
work_category: Debugging IMAP authentication configuration. User reported XOAUTH2 SASL mechanism not available on Gmail, agent investigated and attempted fixes through code edits and system configuration.
summary: Agent engaged in systematic debugging of XOAUTH2 SASL mechanism availability, making configuration edits and testing changes over ~100 seconds. However, the next user message reporting a socket timeout error suggests the original XOAUTH2 issue wasn't fully resolved, indicating partial success and need for continued iteration on the underlying authentication problem.
follow_up_pattern: User reported a new error (socket/timeout) rather than confirming the fix worked. This suggests either the XOAUTH2 fix was unsuccessful or the user moved forward and encountered a secondary network-level issue. Further iteration expected.
